attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is such a stigma attached to claiming benefits these days, that some of Britain's poorest people do not claim their entitlements; for example, some older people are not claiming Pension Credit.

Also, especially DWP, treat people who claim benefits with respect and understanding - most do not claim out of greed, but out of necessity.  

You might be down on your luck, and have to make a claim, one day!
